casebody.data:
PETRIE TRANSPORTATION COMPANY, Inc., Appellee, v. COLONIAL SAND & STONE COMPANY, Appellant. No. 381. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 2, 1934. Single, Atkins & Tyler, of New York City (Christopher E. Heckman, of Now York City, of counsel), for appellant. William F. Purdy, of New York City (Prank C. Mason, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
